name: Wings of Icarus
description:
- 2D side scroller endless runner
- Take control of Icarus as he flies through the labyrinth below Knossos and out into the world where ultimately you fly too close to the sun, fall into the sea and drown. You must escape the wrath of King Minos and his minions.
- One button input;  as you move through the labyrinth you are moving constantly forward, you have to use the space key or mouse click to avoid obstacles and incoming attacks from enemies.
